message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13,500. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm! I'm really interested in the product, but $13,500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now. I'm willing to offer you $12,500 for it. What do you think?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $14,000. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product at this price!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $14,000 is still a bit steep for me.  I'm happy to meet you in the middle again and offer $13,250. This feels like a fair compromise, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $13,750. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal too.
